basics.name: Jose Cayllahua Gutierrez
basics.label: Software Engineer Student, experience in web development, DevOps, and microservices
basics.summary: I'm a software engineer student with experience in web development, mobile development, and DevOps. My passion for technology drives me to tackle new challenges and explore innovative solutions. I am committed to continuous learning and eager to apply my skills in real-world scenarios.

work.name: Software Enterprise Services
work.summary: Angular and .Net developer, problem solving, issues resolution, testing, database management, store procedures creation, web services creation, and more.
highlights: Implemented REST API using Java and Spring Boot for consumption by mobile and web applications.
Created unit tests using Junit/Mockito to validate functions, repositories, requests.
Developed microservices implementing Eureka Server, Config Server, Docker, and PostgreSQL as the database.
Development flow using GitHub Flow, Scrum as an agile framework, and Jenkins for CI/CD configuration.
Created and modified Store Procedures, designed SQL databases.

work.name: Project Collaborator Non-profit
work.summary: Backend Developer specializing in Java and Spring Boot, scalable REST APIs, and microservices with Azure SQL Server and PostgreSQL. Expertise in Junit, Mockito, MVC, TDD, CI/CD, and automated testing.
highlights: Led the development of backend for e-commerce applications using Java and Spring Boot framework to maximize system efficiency and scalability, databases like Azure SQL Server and Azure Database for PostgreSQL were used.
Designed and implemented scalable REST APIs and microservices using Java 11, Junit, Mockito, and other cloud technologies.
Collaborated in elaborating and proposing service architectures, employing software design patterns like MVC, TDD, and microservices.
Implemented Continuous Integration/Deployment, Pipeline Integration, pull requests, code reviews, automated testing, unit/integration testing.

work.name: Freelancer
work.summary: Specializing in REST APIs with Java and Spring Boot, Vue.js web apps, Angular microservices, SonarQube testing, CI/CD with Azure DevOps, and security/performance testing.
highlights: Implemented REST API using Java, Spring Boot, and deployed it on AWS.
Developed a web application using Vue.js as the frontend implementation framework.
Designed and developed microservices for an Angular application, conducting automated tests with SonarQube.
Continuous automated development and continuous implementation using Azure DevOps for organization and Sprint pipelines.
Software experiments were conducted to verify security, response time, and positioning of web applications.
